Reviews.Title: Everything needed to get started
Reviews.Author: Blaze Harmon
Reviews.Content: perfect starter set with more than enough things to play around with.  since it was refurbished it was a lot cheaper than anywhere else.

Reviews.Title: Awesome buy!
Reviews.Author: Rafael V
Reviews.Content: All of the items in this bundle were pretty great. All good as new. You will not notice that it was refurbished if the box has not written refurbished. Nice packaging and arrived in all good condition. This is the best buy ever for me for my first DSLR camera for the great price!

Reviews.Title: Awesome deal!
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: Great camera, professionally packaged and despite being a refurbished unit it looks and operates just like new!  Smoking deal for an SLR

Reviews.Title: Great Camera and lens kit.
Reviews.Author: Anil Sadhwani
Reviews.Content: Got it for a great deal (thanks seller ;))The D3200 is plenty powerful and this kit comes fully equipped to transform your pix for "meh" to "outstanding".The camera has many options and shooting modes. The kit comes with practically everything you will ever want :)

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Camera set
Reviews.Author: Vincestigator
Reviews.Content: I love this camera! It does all of the things my pocket camera didn't and so much more. This is one of my best purchases of 2013

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: Bob Hutton
Reviews.Content: Great pictures, great video and a great price...you can't go wrong with this camera! Plus, it's very simple to use.

Reviews.Title: Nikon D3200 Refurb with kit
Reviews.Author: DAVID L TATUM
Reviews.Content: Very happy with purchase. In great shape, works very well. Great value. Would like to see a direct connection to smart tv in kit.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Douglas White
Reviews.Content: Camera was as advertised. Easy to set up and use. Has more functionality than I will probably ever use, but it is nice to know it is there if I need it. Great value for what I got included with the camera in a package.

Reviews.Title: A Great Bargain for an Amazing Camera
Reviews.Author: Sid "Give Me Some Sugar, Baby!"
Reviews.Content: Just got my camera today.  I'm very satisfied with the product.  I would recommend this camera to anyone looking to move from point and shoot cameras to DSLR.  I was a little hesitant to buy a refurbished product but this product is just like new and I wouldn't know it was refurbished if it wasn't labeled so.  I was really glad that the included battery was fully charged so I got to use my new toy right out of the box.  The D3200 has a solid feel in the hand and both lenses auto focus very quickly and quietly.  Although the body is a bit small, after I attach a battery grip, the camera should fit my large hands nicely.Overall, this is fantastic value.  You really get a lot of camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: William Martin, Let Bill Do It, In-Home Compu...
Reviews.Content: Great camera, my first DSLR, simple to use great Wi-Fi dongle to send pictures to my iPhone.  All that I needed to order was the WU-1a and extra batteries to fill my bag, also included.  Merry Christmas to ME!!!

Reviews.Title: Nikon D3200
Reviews.Author: Shaina Inman
Reviews.Content: The camera is easy to use, color is crisp and bright, and night photos were very impressive.  I wish the remote had a longer ranger. I can only get a couple of feet from the camera which does not permit me ease of taking family shots as I had hoped, but I can live with this small feature flaw.  Maybe Nikon has an upgraded remote.  All in all I love my new Nikon D3200 and accessories. The accessory pack had a lot more in it than I expected.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal!
Reviews.Author: Kaley
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this purchase! I was concerned about buying this camera because it is refurbished, but I'm so glad I did! The camera and all accessories were packaged well and work perfectly. The order was also shipped very quickly after ordering and arrived ahead of schedule. I would highly recommend this seller and this product.

Reviews.Title: Nikon d3200 refurbished
Reviews.Author: david r piccirilli
Reviews.Content: Very impressed with the refurbished unit and lenses. It was as good as new. Do not restate, I just charged the battery and was off and shooting.  Would highly recommend.

<4> Transcend 32GB SDHC 300x Card + <5> Vivitar 52mm UV Glass Filter + <6> Additional Vivitar 52mm UV Glass Filter +
<7> ML-L3 Shutter Remote Control + <8> Precision Design 58" Tripod + <9> PD 2.5x Tele & .45x Wide Lens + <10> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit +
<11> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <12> LCD Screen Protectors + <13> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <14> Image Recovery Software
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D3200 Digital SLR Camera & 18-55mm VR DX AF-S (Black) with 55-200mm VR Lens + 32GB Card + Case + Tripod + 2 Lens Set + Accessory Kit (Refurbished by Nikon USA)
